name: Aqualogica Glow+ Smoothie Face Wash
description: An exfoliating natural face wash with Papaya, Vitamin C, and Hyaluronic Acid.
details: Deeply hydrates and gently exfoliates skin, providing a fresh and radiant glow without drying it out.

reviews.comment: My skin feels so soft and hydrated after using this! The papaya extract really brightens my complexion.

name: Dermatale Sunscreen - SPF 50
description: Tinted mattifying sunscreen ideal for sensitive skin, with SPF 50.
details: Offers strong sun protection without harsh ingredients. Non-greasy formula perfect for daily wear.

reviews.comment: Perfect for my sensitive skin! Doesn't cause any irritation and provides great protection.

name: Lakme Peach Milk Moisturizer
description: Moisturizer with peaches and milk for deep nourishment without oiliness.
details: Lightweight formula nourishes skin while keeping it soft and supple all day.

reviews.comment: Love the peach scent! Keeps my skin moisturized without making it oily.

name: Oil-Free Daily Face Moisturizer
description: Lightweight, oil-free moisturizer that hydrates for up to 24 hours.
details: Ideal for oily and acne-prone skin, keeps your skin moisturized without clogging pores.

reviews.comment: Perfect for my oily skin! Provides hydration without making my face greasy.

name: Hydra Genius Aloe Water
description: Long-lasting hydration for dry and sensitive skin.
details: Infused with aloe water, this gel traps moisture and soothes irritated skin.

reviews.comment: Amazing for dry skin! The aloe water really helps keep my skin hydrated all day.

name: Ceramide & Vitamin C Sunscreen
description: SPF 50 PA+++ sunscreen with ceramides and vitamin C for sensitive skin.
details: Combines brightening and barrier-repair properties with powerful sun protection.

reviews.comment: Great protection and the vitamin C helps brighten my skin over time.

name: Sun Miracle SPF 50 PA++
description: Sunscreen serum with Niacinamide-C to protect from sun and fade dark patches.
details: Lightweight, fast-absorbing serum with clinically proven sun defense and brightening results.

reviews.comment: Love the serum texture! It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave a white cast.

name: Hydro Boost Water Gel
description: Gel-based moisturizer that locks in hydration and smooths skin.
details: Water-based gel with hyaluronic acid helps maintain skin moisture throughout the day.

reviews.comment: Perfect lightweight moisturizer! My skin feels hydrated but not greasy.

name: Hydrating Facial Cleanser
description: Gentle cleanser with ceramides and hyaluronic acid.
details: Removes impurities while preserving the skin’s protective barrier and natural moisture.

reviews.comment: Gentle yet effective! Perfect for my sensitive skin and doesn't strip moisture.
